name: Fish N' Hook (TTT)
description:
Note: Game is best played in Full Screen.

----

Fish N' Hook is an iteration of Tic Tac Toe.

The Hook's are trying to capture to Fish, while the Fish are trying to take the bait off the Hook's and swim away.

Development of this game is still on-going and will update  gradually.

----

References:

  • Fish model, created by Holotna:  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/food/rpg-food-drinks-pack-121067
